channel.title: About on λ ἔρως → λόγος → εγώ
channel.description: Recent content in About on λ ἔρως → λόγος → εγώ

item.title: About
item.description: A student studying in Philophy in National Taiwan University, interested in programming and computer science, and topics about open source, hacker culture, etc. Those three Greek words in the blog title are, respectively, eros, logos, and ego. λ in the title refers to lambda expression in lambda calculus. You can check out my social links below.
